Name: At-Turaif District
Description: At-Turaif District in ad-Dir'iyah - UNESCO World Heritage Site. First capital of the Saudi dynasty with traditional Najdi architecture.

Name: Historic Jeddah
Description: Historic Jeddah, the Gate to Makkah - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historic port city with distinctive coral architecture.

Description: Ancient Najran - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historic oasis city with ancient ruins and traditional architecture.
